text:
Since I was young, i want to become a teacher. I really like the contact with children and i really want to teach them. I think it's a very good job because you help children become autonom. When I was 15 years old, I made an internship in a primary school. That was a very interesting experience. I observe classes for a week and sometimes help the teacher. That was very inspiring. After that, I was sure that I want to become a teacher. I know it's a very difficult job because it needs a lot of work but I'm very motivate. In high school, I helped children to do their homeworks. That was also a good experience. I learn a lot about how help students. I really like doing this.
This year, I chose to do my third year of licence in Scipe. In this studies, we study biology and how to teach children. It's very cool for me. This year, I do an internship in a primary school and I give classes of science every Mondays. It's a very interesting experience because it learns me how to teach children and how to prepare classes. It's very interesting to see how children works and their difficulties in reading for exemple.
I'm really motivated and I really want to become a teacher !
